pageContext.claim: “Epi-pens went from their incredibly high, jacked up prices, to lower than their original give away bargains. Biggest price reductions in history, by far! Nothing like this has ever for our citizens, especially our Seniors. REMEMBER YOUR FAVORITE PRESIDENT!”
pageContext.analysis: This is false. Epinephrine injectors remain expensive, at around $400 as of early 2020, despite a slight decrease in costs when generic alternatives were introduced to the EpiPen.
